trans-unit.resname: HOP·3 | Kor Sanctifiers | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{W}（你可以在施放此咒语时额外支付{W}。）当CARDNAME进战场时，若它已增幅，则消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.resname: HOP·16 | Whiplash Trap | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If an opponent had two or more creatures enter the battlefield under their control this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 如果本回合中某对手有两个或更多生物在其操控下进战场，你可以支付{U}，而不支付CARDNAME的法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: HOP·16 | Whiplash Trap | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 将两个目标生物各移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: HOP·31 | Hideous End | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非黑色的生物。 其操控者失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: HOP·68 | Beast Hunt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 展示你牌库顶的三张牌。 将以此法展示出的所有生物牌置于你手上，其余则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·1 | Academy at Tolaria West | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；竞逐时空时空牌 官方翻译。

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·2 | The Aether Flues | Card Name
OHOP·2 | The Aether Flues | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you planeswalk to CARDNAME and at the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle all other cards revealed this way into your library.
trans-unit.target: 当你时空换入CARDNAME和在你的维持开始时，你可以牺牲一个生物。若你如此作，则从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张生物牌为止，将该牌放进战场，然后将所有以此法展示的其他牌洗入你的牌库。

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·2 | The Aether Flues | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，你可以将一张生物牌从你手上放进战场。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；
非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；官译
非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·11 | The Fourth Sphere | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；半官译；MH1：一重天巨罡兽 First-Sphere Gargantua

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·12 | Glimmervoid Basin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell with a single target, that player copies that spell for each other spell, permanent, card not on the battlefield, and/or player the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of them.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手施放仅具有单一目标的瞬间或法术咒语时，该咒语每能以一个其他的咒语，永久物，不在战场上之牌和／或牌手为目标，该牌手便将该咒语复制一次。每个复制品都要以其中之一为目标，且不能重复选择。

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·12 | Glimmervoid Basin | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, choose target creature. Each player except that creature's controller creates a token that's a copy of that creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，选择目标生物。该生物操控者以外的每位牌手各派出一个为该生物复制品之衍生物。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；官译

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·14 | The Great Forest | Card Name
OHOP·14 | The Great Forest | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
trans-unit.target: 每个生物皆依照其防御力来分配战斗伤害，而不是依照力量。

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·14 | The Great Forest | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, creatures you control get +0/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，直到回合结束，由你操控的生物得+0/+2且获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；官译
非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；
非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；KHM：无尽风暴掠食者 Immersturm Predator

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·18 | Isle of Vesuva | Card Name
OHOP·18 | Isle of Vesuva | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, its controller creates a token that's a copy of that creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非衍生物的生物进战场时，其操控者派出一个为该生物复制品的衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·18 | Isle of Vesuva | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, destroy target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，消灭目标生物和所有与该生物同名的其他生物。

trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，你可以加{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}。

trans-unit.source: When you planeswalk to CARDNAME, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当你时空换入CARDNAME时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的抓牌步骤开始时，额外抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，抓一张牌。

非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；半官译，见于凯德海姆鹏洛客指南第二部分

trans-unit.source: All creatures get +1/+1 and have haste.
trans-unit.target: 所有生物得+1/+1且具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, untap all creatures that attacked this turn. If it's a main phase, there is an additional combat phase after this phase, followed by an additional main phase.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，重置所有于本回合中攻击过的生物。如果是在行动阶段中，则在此阶段后，额外多出一个战斗阶段，以及接于其后之一个额外的行动阶段。

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·37 | Stronghold Furnace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某来源将对任一永久物或牌手造成伤害，则改为它造成两倍的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·37 | Stronghold Furnace | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·38 | Turri Island | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creature spells cost {2} less to cast.

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·38 | Turri Island | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，展示你牌库顶的三张牌。将以此法展示的所有生物牌置于你手上，其余则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·39 | Undercity Reaches | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，其操控者可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·39 | Undercity Reaches | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, you have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，在本盘游戏接下来的时段，你的手牌数量没有上限。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；官译。官译是不是日本来的
